```swift
switch value {
case firstValue:
  code1
case secondValue:
  code2
default:
  code3
} 
```

```swift
    trafficLightColor = "Yellow"
    switch trafficLightColor {
    case "Red":
      print("Stop")
    case "Yellow":
      print("Caution")
    case "Green":
      print("Go")
    default:
      print("Invalid color")
    } 
    ```

```swift
    var spouseName: String?
    **spouseName****=****"Nia"**
    print(spouseName ?? "No value in spouseName") 
    ```

```swift
    spouseName = "Nia"
    print(spouseName ?? "No value in spouseName")
    if let **spouseName** {
       let greeting = "Hello, " + spouseName
       print(greeting)
    } 
    ```
